about: Buy and sell used laptop online
technologyUsed: ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, FireBase, TailwindCSS, Stripe, Vercel
Features: Responsive for both Desktop and Mobile device
Login is authenticated with Firebase and verified with JWT
Separate dashboard for Admin, buyer and seller
Online payment system applied with stripe

Features: Responsive for both Desktop and Mobile device
Firebase login authentication and implementation of CRUD operation on service
User can view all services. To add service or add review user have to login
